member.name: T:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Build
member.summary: Provides builders that create mocked instances.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Build.MockedDbContextFor``1
member.summary: Provides a mocked db context builder.

member.name: T:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Create
member.summary: Factory for creating mocked instances.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Create.MockedDbContextFor``1(System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates a mocked db context.
member.param: The parameters that will be used to create the mocked db context and, if one is not provided, the in-memory context that the mocked db context will use for in-memory provider supported operations.
member.remarks: If you do not provide any constructor arguments this method attempt to create a TDbContext via a constructor with a single DbContextOptionsBuilder parameter or a parameterless constructor.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkCore.Testing.NSubstitute.Create.MockedQueryProviderFor``1(System.Linq.IQueryable{``0})
member.summary: Creates a mocked query provider.
member.param: The query provider source.

member.summary: Sets up ExecuteSqlCommand invocations to return a specified result.
member.param: The mocked db context.
The integer to return when ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.
Operations to perform after ExecuteSqlCommand is invoked.

member.summary: Sets up ExecuteSqlCommand invocations containing a specified sql string to return a specified result.
